content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Mr. Li. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. What is your budget for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I have budget of 800 Euros per month. Can you give me a price?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Certainly, Mr. Li. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would suggest a rental price of 900 Euros per month. This price takes into account the costs of maintenance and utilities, as well as my desire to maximize my gains as a landlord. Is this price within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, it sounds fair. But I want to negotiate. Can you give me a lower price?

My goal is to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord and I am a student, so I am looking for a flexible and affordable option.

Can you give me a lower price? I am willing to negotiate. I am open to discussing a lower rental price if it is possible.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I understand your desire for a lower rental price, Mr. Li. However, as a landlord, I must consider my financial needs and the value of the property. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I am unable to lower the rental price any further than 900 Euros per month. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause, but I hope you can understand my position. Is there anything else we can discuss to come to an agreement that works for both of us?
name: Heinrich Heine
